service_principal_client_id: <client id from running az ad sp create-for-rbac --name [ServicePrincipalName]. Probably http://[ServicePrincipalName].>
service_principal_client_secret: <client secret from running az ad sp create-for-rbac --name [ServicePrincipalName]>
resource_group_name: <name of the resource group to hold the generated VM>
resource_group_location: centralus<to get other names, login, then use az account list-locations | jq '[.[] | {name: .name, displayName: .displayName}]'
